channel.title: Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: Hoist Annapolis Valley
item.description:
Hoist Annapolis Valley is a tech club for teens interested in coding, design and entrepreneurship. If you’re age 12 to 19 and have an interest in startups or coding, then come check it out! Everyone is welcome, and it’s free!

Meet up with Hoist members once per month at Acadia University’s Rural Innovation Centre – like attending an tech + entrepreneurship class at university.

The Hoist Way

Learn! The first half-hour will be a lesson from a pro on the topic of the day – coding…design or business.

Lunch! Have some pizza with your new friends.

Hack! Build or design something, apply what you just learned…it’s a mini hackathon. Work in a group or on your own to create the next big product or service!

Discuss! Reflect and discuss the day…what did you find challenging or exciting? Chill out and talk to your new pals about what you created!

Join our mailing list (see below) to stay up-to-date about our upcoming meetups.

Special Thanks

Big tip of the hat to the Acadia Entrepreneurship Centre for hosting our meetup. And Hoist Halifax for paving the way.

item.title: Tech Meetups
item.description:
Our monthly Refresh meetup is where the Annapolis Valley community of designers, developers and innovators come hang out. Those interested in the creative, technical, and professional culture of digital technology endeavours in the Annapolis Valley meet and talk about all things design, technology, and entrepreneurship.

Refresh meets the second Tuesday evening of each month in the Wolfville area. These are casual affairs with short, member-interest talks followed by an opportunity to mingle.

All are welcome

Join our mailing list (see below) to stay up-to-date about our upcoming meetups.

Special Thanks

Big tip of the hat to the Acadia Entrepreneurship Centre for hosting our meetup and innovacorp for keeping the dream alive.
